    8:-module(utils_test_SUITE).
    9:
   10:-export([all/1, test_read_all_of_file/1]).
   11:
   12:-include("test_server.hrl").
   13:
   14:all(doc) ->
   15:    ["Test the various utility functions"];
   16:
   17:all(suite) ->
   18:    [test_read_all_of_file];
   19:
   20:all(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   21:    ok.
   22:%% Test cases starts here.
   23:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   24:test_read_all_of_file(doc) ->
   25:    ["Test we can read files in full"];
   26:test_read_all_of_file(suite) ->
   27:    [];
   28:test_read_all_of_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   29:    ?line ExpectedData = "1234567890",
   30:    ?line {ok, Data} = utils:read_all_of_file("utils_test_SUITE_data/dummy_file.txt"),
   31:    ?line Data = ExpectedData,
   32:    ok.
